entries.title_d: The Yavin 4 Mining Company wants you to check out a region of space mentioned on the Massassi document you recovered. You are to fly a patrol around the region to see if you can find anything unusual.
entries.title: Yavin System: Following the Leads
entries.split_quest_alert: Your computers have picked up a strange signal coming from up ahead. Move into optimum signal range and investigate.
entries.quest_patrol_d: Travel from assigned nav point to nav point looking for anything unusual.
entries.quest_location_d: The area to be searched is in the Yavin system.
